Matplotlib, and MySQL. Seeking to contribute to Google Developer Groups by building impactful projects, sharing
knowledge, and engaging in collaborative community development.

Projects
Online Quiz Analytic App : Created a customizable quiz application in Python. Users can edit code to add or
change questions, and the app generates outputs with graphs and statistics using Pandas and Matplotlib. Repository:
github.com/rishee-wq/analytic-quiz-app
Outline Selfie App : A Python app using OpenCV and Kivy that captures and saves images directly to the laptop.
Calculator App: Developed a basic calculator GUI app using Kivy.
Ping Pong Game : Built an interactive 2D Ping Pong game in Python.
Dino Game: Recreated the Google Chrome offline dinosaur game with Python. Repository: github.com/rishee-wq/kivy
